articles.author: Maite Fernández Simon
articles.title: African and South Asian citizens fleeing Ukraine denounce racism - The Washington Post
articles.description: Several African, South Asian and Middle Eastern citizens in Ukraine have denounced instances of racism while trying to flee the shelling in the country.
articles.content:
After the cab hit the bottleneck,Orakpo and her friend decided to continue their journey by foot. Orakpo said she only packed some clothes, blankets and her travel documents.

articles.title: Saturday's weather: Heavy rainfall expected across the country - News24
articles.description: The South African Weather Service has issued a yellow level 2 warning for disruptive rainfall over the central and western parts of Free State, western parts of the North West, and north-eastern parts of the Northern Cape.
articles.content:

articles.author: Max Du Plessis
articles.title: WAR IN EUROPE OP-ED: South Africa's Ukraine failure is an international tragedy that doubles as a constitutional calamity - Daily Maverick
articles.description: If South Africa takes these international law obligations seriously it should reverse its position immediately and give up on the ‘quisling’ double-speak about Russia’s aggression and crimes.

articles.author: John Whittle
articles.title: DRIVEN: BMW M240i xDrive Coupé - Carmag South Africa
articles.description: Although BMW doesn’t consciously dabble in the business of psychology (unless you’re after the therapeutic effect of a proper M car), the new M240i xDrive is somewhat reminiscent of a chapter in the theory of middle child syndrome.
